type: Legendary Creature – Human Archer Nomad Noble
rules_text:
Reach; flanking [i](Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)[/i]
[i]Sacaen Nomad – [/i]Whenever Sue, Doe of the Plains becomes blocked, she deals 2 damage to target creature blocking her.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Sue deals combat damage to a player, search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
